General.Name: Roularta
General.Description: Roularta Media Group NV operates as a multimedia company in Belgium, the Netherlands, and Germany. The company operates in two segments, Media Brands and Printing Services. It offers general news, business magazines and sports weeklies, lifestyle magazines, and medical and professional magazines; and local papers, Sunday papers, and online and digital marketing solutions, as well as operates business television. It also provides recruitment solutions; brand studio; real estate, printing, and business information services; events, fairs, and networking services; line extensions and rights; and advertising services. In addition, the company engages in subscriptions and sales of the newsstand. Roularta Media Group NV was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Roeselare, Belgium. Roularta Media Group NV is a subsidiary of Koinon NV.

8.Name: Mr. Jan Van Dyck
8.Title: Editor -In-Chief of Fiscoloog & Le Fiscolog Ue
